about.details:
Mach Conferences and Events Limited was founded in 2004 and offers a comprehensive range of customized services for the MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, Exhibitions) and events sector.

The company specializes in conference management, exhibition management and global event planning. The company also takes care of all logistical aspects of events at specific destinations. This includes venue selection, accommodation, transportation logistics, local activities and on-site coordination.

The company's clients come from the banking, finance, and insurance sectors. The company has also worked for various industries including hospitality, infrastructure, FMCG, etc. In the last financial years i.e. 2023-24, the company has conducted 90 events including London, Mussoorie, Bangalore, South Korea, Paris, Goa, Srinagar, Singapore, etc. The average revenue for conducting such events in FY 2023-24 was Rs. 263.62 lakhs per event.

The company is present with co-working spaces in more than 18 states and union territories including Delhi, Maharashtra, Kolkata, Assam, Tamil Nadu, Jammu & Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, Goa, Rajasthan etc.

As of March 31, 2024, the company had a total of 55 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Mach Conferences and Events IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mach Conferences and Events IPO is a SME IPO of 5568000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹125.28 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹225 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on September 4, 2024, and closes on September 6, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mach Conferences and Events IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mach Conferences and Events IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mach Conferences and Events IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mach Conferences and Events IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mach Conferences and Events IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mach Conferences and Events IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mach Conferences and Events IPO opens on September 4, 2024 and closes on September 6, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mach Conferences and Events IPO?
faqs.answer: Mach Conferences and Events IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mach Conferences and Events IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mach Conferences and Events IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mach Conferences and Events IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mach Conferences and Events IPO will be done on Monday, September 9, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 10, 2024. Check the Mach Conferences and Events IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mach Conferences and Events IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mach Conferences and Events IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 11, 2024.
